categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Anthony Lang (d. March 2, 1992) was the actor who portrayed Sim Aloo in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi.
John Mollo also credits Anthony Lang as portraying one of four "local ugly men" in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope as documented in the 1979 book The Art of Star Wars.
